mapper.select: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m',BillTime) as billDate, count(*) as numOfBill, round(SUM(PaidFee),2) as totalAmount, SUM(Persons) as numOfCust, round((round(SUM(PaidFee),2)/SUM(Persons)),2) as billPerCust FROM MhtBill WHERE 1 = 1 and (BillTime > date(#{param2}, 'start of month') and BillTime < date(#{param2})) or (BillTime > date(#{param2}, 'start of month', '-1 month') and BillTime < date(#{param2}, '-1 month')) GROUP BY billDate ORDER BY billDate DESC
